programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Comedy starring Marlon Wayans and Shawn Wayans. Two black brothers are threatened with expulsion from the FBI following a failed drugs bust. programme.title: Kinky Boots
programme.desc: Comedy drama based on a true story, starring Joel Edgerton and Chiwetel Ejiofor. Charlie Price inherits an ailing Northampton shoe factory when his father dies. After a chance encounter with drag queen Lola, Charlie is convinced the only way out is to produce reinforced heels for transvestites. But can he persuade his strait-laced, prejudiced workforce in time for the Milan fashion show Julian Jarrold - Director Joel Edgerton - Charlie Price Chiwetel Ejiofor - Lola Sarah Jane Potts - Lauren Jemima Rooper - Nicola Linda Bassett - Melanie Nick Frost - Don Ewan Hooper - George Robert Pugh - Harold Price Geoffrey Streatfield - Richard Bailey Mona Hammond - Pat Kellie Bright - Jeannie Joanna Scanlan - Trish Joel Edgerton - Charlie Price Chiwetel Ejiofor - Lola Sarah Jane Potts - Lauren Jemima Rooper - Nicola Linda Bassett - Melanie Nick Frost - Don Ewan Hooper - George Robert Pugh - Harold Price Geoffrey Streatfield - Richard Bailey Mona Hammond - Pat Kellie Bright - Jeannie Joanna Scanlan - Trish.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Family, Drama, Animation, Fantasy, Musical, Children's, Arts And Culture ║ 2000 ║ U
programme.desc: Animated adventure. Tulio and Miguel, two small-time Spanish tricksters, get their hands on a map to El Dorado, the legendary city of gold. After inadvertently stowing away aboard a Mexico-bound ship captained by the famous conquistador Cortes, they find themselves washed up on the shores of the Americas with a horse named Altivo and head off to find the fabled lost city Eric \Bibo\ Bergeron - Director Don Paul - Director Will Finn - Director David Silverman - Director Elton John - Narrator Kevin Kline - Tulio Kenneth Branagh - Miguel Rosie Perez - Chel Armand Assante - Tzekel-Kan Edward James Olmos - Chief Jim Cummings - Cortes Frank Welker - Altivo Tobin Bell - Zaragoza Elton John - Narrator Kevin Kline - Tulio Kenneth Branagh - Miguel Rosie Perez - Chel Armand Assante - Tzekel-Kan Edward James Olmos - Chief Jim Cummings - Cortes Frank Welker - Altivo Tobin Bell - Zaragoza.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Drama, Animation, Action, Fantasy, Children's ║ 2008 ║ PG
programme.desc: Animated adventure featuring the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman and Angelina Jolie. Ancient China: Po the Panda lives in the Valley of Peace and dreams of becoming a kung fu master despite the fact he is clumsy, overweight and a complete beginner at martial arts. So when he's accidentally chosen to be the legendary Dragon Warrior, he is overjoyed. However, his joy is short-lived as the evil snow leopard Tai Lung has escaped from captivity and is on his way to the Valley to take his revenge on Po's mentor Mark Osborne - Director John Stevenson - Director Jack Black - Po Dustin Hoffman - Master Shifu Angelina Jolie - Tigress Ian McShane - Tai Lung Jackie Chan - Monkey Seth Rogen - Mantis Lucy Liu - Viper David Cross (2) - Crane Michael Clarke Duncan - Commander Vachir Jack Black - Po Dustin Hoffman - Master Shifu Angelina Jolie - Tigress Ian McShane - Tai Lung Jackie Chan - Monkey Seth Rogen - Mantis Lucy Liu - Viper David Cross (2) - Crane Michael Clarke Duncan - Commander Vachir.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Reese Witherspoon and Mark Ruffalo. programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on Dan Brown's forerunner to The Da Vinci Code, starring Tom Hanks and Ayelet Zurer. With the election of a new pope imminent, the Illuminati kidnap the four leading contenders and issue a coded message that they will murder the men and blow up the Vatican. programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Drama, Animation, Action, Children's ║ 2006 ║ U
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Bruce Willis, Garry Shandling and Steve Carell. When Vincent the bear wakes from his winter hibernation to find that scheming raccoon RJ has stolen his stash of food, he gives RJ a deadline to return it, or else. programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler and Kevin James. When widowed New York firefighter Larry Valentine is told that he can't name his children as life assurance beneficiaries unless he remarries, he asks devoted colleague and serial womaniser Chuck to pose as his civil partner. programme.title: Oldboy
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Choi Min-sik. Oh Dae-su is kidnapped and imprisoned for no apparent reason. programme.title: The Cinema List: Christmas Crackers
programme.desc: A look at some favourite festive family films, from Elf and Home Alone to Arthur Christmas and The Polar Express.

programme.title: Last Train to Christmas
programme.desc: Tony Towers, a successful nightclub manager and local celebrity, embarks upon the 3:17 to Nottingham for a Christmas family reunion in 1985, but things soon get a little strange. Moving up a carriage to the buffet car lands him in 1995, where he finds his clubs have failed and his life has fallen apart. Tony discovers that by moving up and down this fateful train, he can transport himself forward and backward to various stages of his life. Not only that, but the actions he takes in one carriage directly affect his life in the next. programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!
programme.desc: Eternally cool director Richard Linklater's "spiritual sequel" to 1993's slacker hit Dazed and Confused follows a house full of baseball jocks as they spend some quality party time together before the start of the 1980 college year. Over four wonderfully wasted days, freshman Jake (Blake Jenner) bonds with his new teammates over bongs, babes, beer and batting practice... all to some of the finest tracks ever to grace a cassette player. programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ PG
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. programme.title: WTA Final: Tokyo
programme.desc: A second straight final for Qinwen Zheng, as the 23-year-old world number seven of China plays 2020 Australian Open champion Sofia Kenin for the title at the Toray Pan Pacific Open. (27.10).

programme.desc: A review of the 2024 Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships, a WTA 1000 hard-court event.

programme.title: ATP Final: Basel
programme.desc: Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard gets set for his first 500-level final as he faces Ben Shelton for the ATP Basel title. Mpetshi Perricard beat Shelton in their only previous encounter. (27.10).

programme.desc: A review of the 2024 National Bank Open, a WTA 1000 hard-court event in Toronto, Canada.

programme.title: WTA Monsatir: Kartal v ?ramková

programme.title: WTA Hong Kong: Boulter v Shnaider

programme.title: PL: Tottenham v United 06/07

programme.title: PL: United v Tottenham 08/09

programme.title: PL: United v Tottenham 09/10

programme.title: PL: United v Tottenham 10/11

programme.title: NFL: Packers @ Seahawks Hlts
programme.desc: Well positioned to make the playoffs, the Seattle Seahawks take on the Green Bay Packers during week 15 of the NFL regular season. The Packers come from defeat to the Lions. (15.12).

programme.title: NFL: Bills @ Rams Hlts
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from a week 14 match-up during the 2024 NFL regular season, as Josh Allen and the Buffalo Bills travel to Los Angeles to face the Rams in the NFL. (08.12).

programme.title: LIVE: NFL: Falcons @ Raiders
programme.desc: The Las Vegas Raiders compete with the Atlanta Falcons during week 15 of the 2024 NFL regular season. (16.12).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Grant Thornton Invitational, held in Florida. Here, 16 LPGA and 16 PGA Tour players fought together in a unique co-sanctioned team event.

programme.title: WBBL Final 2021: Perth v Adelaide
programme.desc: In the final of the 2021 Women's Big Bash League, the Perth Scorchers take on the Adelaide Strikers at the Optus Stadium. The Strikers are chasing their maiden title.

programme.title: S Africa W v England W Test Hlts
programme.desc: England enter the second day of their one-off Test against South Africa in Bloemfontein at the Mangaung Oval. (16.12).

programme.title: BBL: Sydney S v Melbourne R Hlts
programme.desc: The Sydney Sixers go again in pursuit of a fourth BBL title, as last year's beaten finalists take on the Melbourne Renegades. (16.12).

programme.title: LIVE: BBL: Sydney T v Adelaide S
programme.desc: The Sydney Thunder compete with the Adelaide Strikers in the 2024-25 Big Bash League. The Strikers fell at the Challenger stage in last year's competition. (17.12).

programme.title: Fight Night: Jonas v Habazin
programme.desc: A must-win night for two British world champions on a collision course, as Natasha Jonas meets Ivana Habazin in a unification bout, while Lauren Price defends against Bexcy Mateus. (14.12).

programme.title: S/Lge Wheelchair Grand Final
programme.desc: The 2024 Betfred Wheelchair Super League champions are crowned at the Allam Sports Centre, as Leeds Rhinos take on Halifax Panthers. (13.10).

programme.title: S/Lge Grand Final: Wgan v Hull KR
programme.desc: Hull KR make their maiden Grand Final appearance as the Robins take on the current Betfred Super League champions Wigan Warriors, who make a second successive Old Trafford outing. (12.10).

programme.title: NRLW Grand Final:Roosters v Sharks
programme.desc: A first Grand Final appearance since 2021 for the Sydney Roosters, as Sam Bremner and co come up against the Cronulla Sharks to conclude the 2024 Telstra Women's Premiership. (06.10).

programme.title: NRL Grand Final: Storm v Panthers
programme.desc: An NRL Grand Final for the ages, as two of the very best battle it out for glory at Accor Stadium, where defending premiers Penrith face this term's minor premiers Melbourne Storm. (06.10).

programme.title: My Icon: Nigel Owens
programme.desc: In the next episode of this special series, esteemed Welsh rugby referee Nigel Owens discusses his experiences in sport, and his support for the Rainbow Laces campaign.

programme.title: My Icon: Maggie Alphonsi
programme.desc: In this special series, former English rugby star and World Cup winner Maggie Alphonsi discusses the individuals that have inspired her during her life and career.

programme.title: Men's State Of Origin #1
programme.desc: The men's State of Origin series begins at Accor Stadium as the Maroons bring back-to-back series wins into the 2024 edition with the Blues looking for payback under a new coach. (05.06).

programme.title: Men's State Of Origin #2
programme.desc: The men's State of Origin series makes its highly anticipated return to Melbourne for game two at the MCG, as the Blues hope to bounce back from defeat to the Maroons in the opener. (26.06).

programme.title: Usyk v Fury 1
programme.desc: Highlights from Tyson Fury and Oleksandr Usyk's undisputed world heavyweight title clash in Saudi Arabia, as two undefeated champions met with all four major belts on the line. (18.05).

programme.title: Usyk v Fury 2: Behind The Ropes
